summary.span: 提供支持用户创建的批注的类，这些批注与 WPF 文档查看控件中显示的内容有关。

span.span: Provides classes to support user-created annotations on content displayed in WPF document viewing controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的类型提供命名空间来支持 Windows Presentation Foundation 文档查看控件中显示的应用程序数据的管理用户创建的批注。Types in the namespace are provided to support the management of user-created annotations on application data displayed in Windows Presentation Foundation document viewing controls. 使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]应用程序可以添加对用户创建的便笺和突出显示存储独立于应用程序文档本身的支持。Using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] applications can add support for user-created notes and highlights that are stored separate from the application document itself. 由于用户批注信息与文档内容分开存储，用户甚至可以添加说明，并突出显示为无法以物理方式更改的或只读权限管理文档。Since the user annotation information is stored separately from the document content, users can even add notes and highlights to read-only or rights-managed documents that cannot be physically changed.
